name: convert_xfm
author: FMRIB
description: convert_xfm, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl.utils, interface: ConvertXFM). Use the FSL utility convert_xfm to modify FLIRT transformation matrices.

inputs.name: Concat xfm
inputs.description: A File. Write joint transformation of two input matrices.

inputs.name: Fix scale skew
inputs.description: A File. Use secondary matrix to fix scale and skew.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input transformation matrix.

inputs.name: Out file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Final transformation matrix.

output-files.name: Output transform
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output transformation matrix.
